definition: to be strongly attached to/to be dedicated/to cling to
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: Nirodha extinguishes all forms of clinging and attachment.
sentences.chinese: 灭消灭一切形式的执着和依恋。

sentences.english: It’s funny how people’s obsessions come back to bite them.
sentences.chinese: 稀奇的是，执着的人们如何反咬一口。

sentences.english: It insists upon one’s performing an act of lucidity as one performs an act of faith.
sentences.chinese: 它坚持要求人们行事明晰透彻，如同执着于信仰。

sentences.english: Who pale I wait, the irony of my dedication.
sentences.chinese: 缐谁苍白了我的等待，讽刺了我的执着。

sentences.english: Persist to work hard in her the dream that that freedom write as of oldly.
sentences.chinese: 依旧的在她的那自由撰稿的梦里执着着打拼着呀。

sentences.english: Whoever ignorantly creates an attachment, that stupid person comes upon suffering again and again.
sentences.chinese: 无知的蠢人执着生存因素，一再蒙受痛苦。

sentences.english: Perhaps that is why I was so persistent in the presence of ring tones bar.
sentences.chinese: 也许，正因如此，我才如此执着于铃音的存在吧。

sentences.english: Overly nice guys are too enamored with trying to get everyone involved.
sentences.chinese: 滥好人都太执着于试图让每个人都进来。

sentences.english: Ms. Mogilner took an internship to 'show her commitment' to her new career path.
sentences.chinese: 莫吉内通过实习来显示自己对新的职业道路的执着。

sentences.english: Zhiping should be the blogger who shows most interests in English that I've ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 志萍应该是我见过所有博主里对英语最执着的一位。

sentences.english: In and between, it is all the persistence to beauty.
sentences.chinese: 风起潮涌间，都映出了一份对美的执着。

sentences.english: Oneself are beautiful, said, flower flower also is drunk, why attached to an end?
sentences.chinese: 己说，花开是美，花落亦是醉，何必执着于一种结局？

sentences.english: I think love your dedication, but in your eyes is still.
sentences.chinese: 那些我自以为爱你的执着，在你眼里不过是死缠烂打。
依然执着保持着花团怒放。

sentences.english: They get what they want by bellowing and no fooling.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过怒吼和执着得到他们想要的东西。

sentences.english: I will never forgive you because you do not understand my dedication stump.
sentences.chinese: 我原谅你因为你永远蔸不懂我的执着。

definition: to fall in love/to love sb or sth dearly (lover, or art)
to yearn for/to look forward to
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
pure and innocent like the heart of a newborn/sincere
